verbose_text: We recently showed that chitosan can attract angiogenic, arginase-1+ alternatively activated (AA) macrophages to subchondral bone and promote the formation of CD-31 / PE-CAM+ angiogenic vessels at 2 weeks.
evidence: chitosan can attract angiogenic, arginase-1+ alternatively activated (AA) macrophages to subchondral bone and promote the formation of CD-31
